name: The Window
description:
A tribute to John Karel aka jjjjjohn.

John's window used to be a stage for exhibits, now it has become the exhibit itself.

Sound on!

Click on a brick in the windowsill to activate or deactivate it.
Toggle sequencer playback with [space bar].
Toggle rotation with [return key].
Empty your sequencer with [del key].
Click anywhere to toggle between camera front view and sequencer view.

Enjoy your sequence.
